remarks: Part of proof of Lemma G in [Crawley] p. 116, line 19.  Show p ` \/ ` q = p ` \/ ` u.  TODO: reformat ~ cdleme0cp to match this, then replace with ~ cdleme0cp .  (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2013.)
statement:
cdlemg3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg3.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemg3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg3.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdlemg3a $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P .\/ Q ) = ( P .\/ U ) ) $.
